Instructions for the figures from kCSD-revisited paper.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Figure 1 - Spectral properties of kCSD method for well-placed and misplaced electrodes

name: kcsd_properties/Fig1-figure_Tbasis.py 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Figure 2 - Simulated cortical column and kCSD analysis

name: npx/Fig2-traub_data_kcsd_column_figure.py

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Figure 3 - LFP and CSD within the model column and experimental data as a function of time

name: npx/Fig3-figure_traub_timespace.py

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Figure 4 - An example reconstruction of the LFP and CSD in the plane of the 
electrodes from a snapshot in time from an experimental recording in the rat barrel cortex

name: npx/Fig4-Neuropixels_with_fitted_dipoles_model.py

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Figure 5 - Schematic

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Figure 6 - Eigensources for a single bank of a Neuropixels probe

name: npx/Fig6-figure_traub_eigensources.py
